item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0984; 03:12PM; 553 N Virgil Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LXDX8o; East Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 43 firefighters (prior to the arrival of the additionally requested resources) extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was primarily contained to the porch and front of the house. A primary and secondary search found no occupants. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC2 BC5 CM22 E11 E20 E211 E220 E227 E229 E27 E3 E52 E6 EM1 HR3 RA20 RA811 RA826 RA827 T11 T20 T27 T29 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0984; 03:00PM; 553 N Virgil Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LXDX8o; East Hollywood; One story, single family dwelling with heavy fire showing. One additional task force requested. Reports from the 9-1-1 caller of a person trapped inside are unconfirmed at this time. ; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E11 E20 E211 E220 E27 E6 RA20 RA811 RA826 T11 T20; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Cliff, Vehicle; INC#0315; 07:20AM; 2800 W Observatory Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/355RN5J; Griffith Park; Firefighters are with the 68 yo (age update) female patient. There is no entrapment. The extent of her injuries is not known at this time. LAFD Air Ops is enroute to conduct a hoist operation. LAPD Inc# 0792 No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E20 E220 E227 E235 E27 E35 E52 E56 EM5 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 HR3 RA27 RA35 RA56 RA6 RA835 RH114 T20 T27 T35 UR27 UR88; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Cliff, Vehicle; INC#0315; 07:13AM; 2800 W Observatory Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/355RN5J; Griffith Park; One passenger vehicle is down the side of cliff, approximately 300' into the canyon. Park Rangers made their way to the vehicle and report one 68yo female patient, alert and talking (extent of injuries unknown at this time). Firefighters are on scene and making their way down with equipment, to assess the situation to determine the safest method of bringing the patient up to the road for treatment/transport as required. The 9-1-1 call was received at 6:49AM.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E20 E220 E235 E35 E52 E56 EM5 HR3 RA35 RA56 RA6 RA835 T20 T35 UR27 UR88 H2 H3 RH114; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire - Now Contained; INC#1772; 11:05PM; 12224 W Osborne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uuzbqX; Pacoima; Firefighters stopped forward progression of the brush fire at three-quarters of an acre in or near Hansen Dam Recreation Area in 41 minutes (11:46pm), without injury. Crews will be working in the area for an extended time period to "mop up" any remaining hotspots within the perimeter.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 E24 E275 E298 E7 E75 E77 E90 E91 E98 EM15 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 RA90 RA98 RH114 T75 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0877; 02:09PM; 305 W 31st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vdzfN0; San Pedro; Although firefighters initially saw smoke from the attic, the source of the fire was found to be on the first floor. Twenty-six firefighters extinguished the flames in 34 minutes, preventing the fire from climbing its way to the attic (only smoke). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E101 E238 E248 RA101 RA848 T38 T48; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0877; 01:35PM; 305 W 31st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vdzfN0; San Pedro; Two-story apartment with smoke showing from the attic (fire appears to be spreading vertically from the first floor). Offensive mode.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E101 E238 E248 RA101 RA848 T38 T48; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1267; 06:46PM; 823 E Superba Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jpTule; Venice; *Corrected Address* Upon arrival firefighters found a one-story home burning, and flames spreading a three-story home next door (825 E Superba Av). The first 42 firefighters extinguished flames in both homes in 36 minutes. Thankfully, all occupants were able to evacuate safely and no injuries were reported. LAFD Fire Investigators are on scene performing a fire-cause investigation.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 BC18 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM22 E205 E26 E263 E269 E295 E43 E52 E59 E63 E67 E89 EA1 EM9 HR3 RA43 RA59 T27 T5 T63 T69 T95 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1267; 06:10PM; 833 E Superba Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jpTule; Venice; Single-family home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E263 E63 E67 RA43 RA59 T5 T63; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Rescue; INC#0730; 12:45PM; 3363 N Coldwater Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rdHYxC; #ShermanOaks; Despite the rapid response of 39 LAFD Firefighters, including those specially trained, equipped and certified for Urban Search & Rescue operations, who utilized a Truck mounted aerial ladder, rope and harness system to safely extricate the adult male tree trimmer (trapped 50' above ground in an upside down position for an unknown time period), the man, now at ground level, has sadly been determined beyond medical help and is deceased at the scene. His affiliation with the site, and employer is unknown. Though energized electrical wires were in or near the (unknown type) tree, their role, if any, in the man's death is presently unknown. Media Inquiries: CAL-OSHA, Coroner.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC12 BC14 CM42 E108 E278 E288 E88 EM14 HR3 RA85 RA88 RA99 T78 T88 UR88; CH8; 17, 18; Brian Humphrey
